item.title: Privacy
item.description: The aim of this page is to describe how your private information is used by this site. If I’ve missed anything glaring, or you have any questions, or you’ve inadvertently shared information on this site that you’d like taken down, please contact me. General I use Google Analytics to monitor site usage the site is completely HTTPS - thanks Let’s Encrypt! the site is hosted by Google appengine &, when I refer to server-side processing below, that’s what I mean the site’s code is all open and published on Github.
